item.title: AngularJS Wikipedia Search App - Part Two
item.description:
Continued from Part One
Build a Wikipedia Search App With AngularJS Part Two - Use Output So, if everything went as expected in the first part, you should be getting output in your console. Now we need to actually display the output on the page. The JavaScript We first need to modify our app so that it does something with the data besides printing to the console. [js] // app.
